ingredients.ingredient: cans (10.75 oz each) cream of chicken soup
cups crispy bread crumbs or any dry stuffing mix

defaultInstruction.step: Fully cook and chop chicken into pieces, set aside
Place chicken in bottom of ungreased baking dish.
Spoon soup evenly over chicken and top with shredded cheese.
In medium bowl stir together melted butter and breadcrumbs. Sprinkle over baking dish.
Bake 35 to 40 minutes or until bubbly.

halfInstruction.step: Fully cook and chop chicken into pieces, set aside
Place chicken in bottom of ungreased baking dish.
Spoon soup evenly over chicken and top with shredded cheese.
In medium bowl stir together melted butter and breadcrumbs. Sprinkle over baking dish.
Bake 18 to 20 minutes or until bubbly.

doubleInstruction.step: Fully cook and chop chicken into pieces, set aside
Place chicken in bottom of ungreased baking dish.
Spoon soup evenly over chicken and top with shredded cheese.
In medium bowl stir together melted butter and breadcrumbs. Sprinkle over baking dish.
Bake 70 to 80 minutes or until bubbly.
